## Expectation.toLooseEqual() method

Performs a recursive equality check. Objects are equal if their fields are equal. Object prototypes are ignored.

You can use matchers in place of a value. When a matcher is encountered its internal rules are used instead of the usual checks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toLooseEqual(value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | value to check against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
